https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/fytUrVCnVLP1OjlljdxO3Yq3h8s.jpg An African American widow with two kids who has so much love to give, she often fosters children who need a home. She finds out that Peter and Rachel, the white siblings she fostered twice before, fled from their latest foster home. Color of Love
